Title: Content Injection via TileJSON Name
Description: Mapbox.js is vulnerable to a cross-site-scripting attack in certain uncommon usage scenarios.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.6.6, all versions starting from 2.0.0-beta0 before 2.2.4
Solution:
Upgrade to Mapbox.js version 2.2.4. If you are still using a 1.x version and unable to upgrade to 2.2.4, upgrade to 1.6.6.

If you are unable to upgrade to either 2.2.4 or 1.6.6, you can also remove instances of L.mapbox.shareControl from your maps.
